(Simplified: 垆)
Chinese Definition:
①黑色堅硬的土：壚土。壚植(黑色的黏土)。
②舊時酒店裏安放酒甕的土臺子，亦指酒店：酒壚。壚邸(酒店)。當壚(賣酒)。
(Simplified: 垆)

壚字的基本解释

壚
lú
见“垆”。

壚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
“垆1”的繁体字。
(1)黑色或黄黑色坚硬而质粗不粘的土壤。
(2)古时酒店里安放酒瓮的炉形土台子。借指酒店。
(3)因震惊、恐惧而瘫倒。
(4)通“爐”。

壚字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　壚； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页241第29
【廣韻】落胡切【集韻】【韻會】龍都切，?音盧。【說文】黑剛土也。【書·禹貢】豫州下土墳壚。【周禮·地官·草人】埴壚用豕。【註】以埴爲黏，以壚爲疏。【呂覽】凡耕之道，必始于壚，爲寡澤而後枯。　又黃壚，黃泉也。【淮南子·兵略訓】蟠乎黃壚之下。【曹植·責躬詩】抱罪黃壚。　又酒區。【史記·司馬相如傳】令文君當壚。【世說】王戎過黃公酒壚，謂客曰：吾與叔夜嗣宗酣飮此壚，自嵆阮亡後，視此雖近，邈若山河。　又【集韻】凌如切，音閭。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
"垆1" in traditional characters.
(1) Black or yellow-black hard and coarse non-sticky soil.
(2) A furnace-shaped earthen platform where a wine urn was placed in an ancient hotel. Refers to the hotel.
(3) Collapse due to shock and fear.
(4) Through the "furnace".
clay

[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　垆; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 241 29
[Guang Yun] Luo Hu Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Long Du Qi,? Yin Lu. [Said the text] Hei Gang Tu also. 【Book·Yugong】Xiatu tombs in Yuzhou. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Grass Man】Yang 垆 uses hog. 【Note】Yang is sticky, and luo is sparse. [Lu Lan] Every way of plowing must begin with 垆, and then wither after being widowed.　Yellow again, Huangquan also. [Huainanzi·Strategic Training] Pan is under Huangluo. [Cao Zhi·Poetry of Bowing Rebuke] Huang Lu is guilty of crime.　Also wine area. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography】Ling Wenjun act as Lu. 【World Talk】Wang Rong had passed Huanggong Jiulong, and he said: I and Shu Ye's heirs had a taste for this mountain. Since the death of Ruan Ruan, although this is close, Miao is like a mountain and river.　 [Ji Yun] Ling Ruqie, Yin Lu. The same meaning.
